text:
Everytime a DOMMouseEvent is captured, when triggered by a right click, the meta key flag is set to true despite the fact that the meta key (command key on macs) is NOT pressed.

Tomorrow I can provide some code to test this issue, if you want.

BR,
Eduardo Ellery
creator: eduellery@gmail.com

text:
(In reply to comment #0)
> Everytime a DOMMouseEvent is captured, when triggered by a right click, the
> meta key flag is set to true despite the fact that the meta key (command key on
> macs) is NOT pressed.

Batik 1.6 is rather old. Are you really still using this version or was it set in the bug report by mistake?


> Tomorrow I can provide some code to test this issue, if you want.

Providing a test case, when one has skills for that, shouldn't be optional. ;-)


Please double check with a nightly build, as if you really are using 1.6 then it's likely that the issue was already fixed. You may use Cameron's nightly builds [1], if the official ones and/or checking out from SVN and building from scratch doesn't feel comfortable enough. ;-)


> BR,
> Eduardo Ellery

Cheers,
 Helder


[1] http://mcc.id.au/batik-nightly/
creator: helder.magalhaes@gmail.com
